name: reanalyze
description: Analyzers for Dead Code/Types and termination

scripts.build406: cp src/dune src/dune.saved && cp src/dune.406 src/dune && npm run build && mv src/dune.saved src/dune
scripts.install:examples: (cd examples/deadcode && npm install) & (cd examples/termination && npm install)
scripts.build:examples: (cd examples/deadcode && npm run clean && npm run build && npm run analyze) & (cd examples/termination && npm run clean && npm run build && npm run analyze)
scripts.dce: dune build && dune exec reanalyze.exe -- -suppress dead-code-ppx,src/compiler-libs-406 -unsuppress doesnotexist -dce-cmt _build
scripts.exception: dune build && dune exec reanalyze.exe -- -exclude-paths src/compiler-libs-406/parser.ml -suppress src/ext,src/compiler-libs-406 -exception-cmt _build

author: Cristiano Calcagno
